<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fulus of Concealment](/Equipment.aspx?ID=973)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Fulu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=378" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 159 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 40 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 hour

**Usage** affixed to the ground in four spaces along a 10-foot radius circle

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This fulu comes in four pieces, one placed in each cardinal direction. Choose one of the following traits when Activating the fulus: [animal](/Traits.aspx?ID=9), [beast](/Traits.aspx?ID=20), [celestial](/Traits.aspx?ID=23), [fey](/Traits.aspx?ID=69), [fiend](/Traits.aspx?ID=70), [humanoid](/Traits.aspx?ID=91), [monitor](/Traits.aspx?ID=111), [plant](/Traits.aspx?ID=125), or [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160). Those within the fulus' circle upon activation (including the fulus themselves) gain the effect of [_invisibility sphere_](/Spells.aspx?ID=165), but only against creatures with the chosen trait. If any of the fulus are moved or destroyed after activation, the effect ends.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
